name: Only 90's Kids Remember
description:
"Only 90's kids will remember" or "O90sKWR" for short is a 4 player single-screen multiplayer brawler that has a 90's setting.

Description

Wanna show your fellow Generation Y buddies who is the most ninety of you?

Get this game and fuck them up with old school 90's toys like:

  • Furbies (that explode)
  • Lava Lamps
  • Legos (they hurt)
  • Jojos

Team

  • Bachmann Christof
  • Lercher Alexander
  • Roither Christoph
  • Steinkellner Philip
  • Tscheinig Andreas
  • Waysocher Peter
  • Wedenig Christoph
